about_the_game:
General description:

In Unlighted you will play as a test subject that works for a company called Umbral Alchemy, dedicated to the research of stones with mysterious properties never seen before by humans. Thanks to you they hope to discover the origin of these strange materials, but it won't be an easy path.

As a test subject you will have to test your abilities to advance through the different tests that the scientists of Umbral Alchemy will set you. If you manage to survive, which is highly improbable, you will be remembered as a hero who has managed to solve the greatest mystery of mankind, or at least of those who know about the existence of the Umbralite rocks.

Game Features:.

You will solve puzzles in first person using a scanner for given by Umbral Alchemy. With a minimalist and oppressive graphic style, accompanied by sounds and music that will create nerves, tension and desire to see what will happen if you continue with the tests.

Gameplay:

By using the Scanner, you will have to observe where the key parts will be to solve the puzzles that Umbral Alchemy will pose. Make the Umbralite appear to pass the test and be able to reach the next one.

Content:

When you enter the Unlighted project, you will have to solve 20 different puzzles. It will not include DLC's. Will not include cosmetics.

Game modes:

Single player first person story mode.

Upgrades and Support:

Currently there will be no DLC's in the future. We will continue updating and giving post-release support, fixing the necessary problems.

name: Unlighted

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U or Ryzen 5 2500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or RTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: You will play as a test subject that works for a company called Umbral Alchemy, dedicated to the research of stones with mysterious properties never seen before by humans. Thanks to you they hope to discover the origin of these strange materials, but it won't be an easy path.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Catalan
*languages with full audio support
